setEffects.4: Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.

flower.name: Medal of the Brave
flower.desc: A simple flower brooch that is a keepsake from someone's first adventure.

plume.name: Prospect of the Brave
plume.desc: A shimmering feather from a songbird that brings a nudge of courage to its wearer.

sands.name: Fortitude of the Brave
sands.desc: A dated miniature hourglass that serves no practical purpose. It seems as elusive as time itself.

goblet.name: Outset of the Brave
goblet.desc: A crude wooden vessel filled only with memories.

circlet.name: Crown of the Brave
circlet.desc: A rough-and-ready laurel wreath that seems as precious as a king's golden crown.
